attributes.action: Make it a requirement for food companies to state if a product in vegetarian
attributes.additional_details: "there are over 3 million vegetarians in the UK today and vegetarians are becoming increasingly common in UK culture." - learnenglishteens.britishcouncil.org
attributes.background: It is annoying and difficult for vegetarians to constantly check the long list of unknown ingrediants when shopping for a long time or in a hurry. Many of the ingrediants are not commonly known to potential buyers and consumers.
